column5: I'm new to OFC so I thought I'd introduce myself.   My name is Doug and I'm a newbie steelheader.  I grew up in London, fished a lot around Owen Sound with my dad, and after years of wanting to pick up the rod again was introduced to steelheading by a friend from work.  I'm now totally obsessed.  Many thanks to Bly and Cliff for a great day on Oshawa Creek yesterday, and to Scott (CanadianCopper) for advice on beginner float rod.  Sincerely, Doug
Welcome aboard douger,this is the best fishing site there is,and we have the best people going ,so enjoy and learn and contribute,and you will have a great time and meet lots of new freinds....cheers
Welcome aboard Doug. Hope you enjoy your time spent here.
Welcome to you, Doug. Lotsa good folks here.
welcome aboard! hope to see some and reviews in the near future!!... Bud
Welcome on Doug.   You have a real good start with meeting the fine folk you did already on the creek.
Welcome Doug.   You're avatar looks pretty interesting ... where abouts was the pic taken ?
Welcome Doug, if you already know Cliff, Bly and CC, then you know the caliber of people on this board is great.  Enjoy your stay,  Maureen
It was great meeting you out on the trib.  You'll hook into a nice steelie very soon...that's my prediction!  Welcome to the board....it's been a source of information and motivation for bly and I!!!

Thanks for all the kind replies.  The avatar pic is from Vietnam.  My wife was born there but raised in TO.  We went there for 5 weeks this past summer and had an amazing time.  We spent some great time with her extended family and toured most of the country from south to north.  -d-
Welcome aboard Doug - this place is addicting!   Don
Welcome Doug.Remember we like pictures.And we love pics of those steelheads.
